items.title: CISA Releases Security Advisory on Critical Vulnerabilities in Industrial Control Systems
items.description: CISA has released a security advisory addressing critical vulnerabilities in multiple industrial control system products. These vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to compromise affected systems.

items.title: CISA Adds Known Exploited Vulnerabilities to Catalog
items.description: CISA has added several known exploited vulnerabilities to its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities Catalog based on evidence of active exploitation.

items.title: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory on Phishing Campaign Targeting Critical Infrastructure
items.description: This joint cybersecurity advisory provides information on a sophisticated phishing campaign targeting U.S. critical infrastructure sectors.
